kindred.view.cli

Class TerminalColourHelper

  • Object
    • kindred.view.cli.TerminalColourHelper

  • public final class TerminalColourHelper
extends Object
    Provides methods to manage colours in a command-line interface.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private TerminalColourHelper()
      Do not instantiate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void drawMatrix(Atom[][] atoms)
      Prints a matrix of Atoms.
      static String getEscapeSequence(Colour bg, Colour fg)
      Returns a formatted ANSI escape sequence to change background and foreground colours.
      static void resetColours()
      Resets the terminal background and foreground colours to their default values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TerminalColourHelper

        private TerminalColourHelper()
        Do not instantiate.

    • Method Detail

      • getEscapeSequence

        public static String getEscapeSequence(Colour bg,
                       Colour fg)
        Returns a formatted ANSI escape sequence to change background and foreground colours.
        Parameters:
        bg - the background colour
        fg - the foreground colour
        Returns:
        an ANSI escape string that changes the colours in a terminal

      • resetColours

        public static void resetColours()
        Resets the terminal background and foreground colours to their default values.

      • drawMatrix

        public static void drawMatrix(Atom[][] atoms)
        Prints a matrix of Atoms. Each Atom is printed with its corresponding character using their background and foreground colours. Additionally, column and row headers are printed to show their coordinates to the user.
        Parameters:
        atoms - a matrix of Atoms to be printed
